dict.string: CathsApp uses Bluetooth to connect to wireless headphones and speakers, allowing you to make high-quality voice and video calls through your preferred audio devices.
CathsApp uses Bluetooth to detect and connect to nearby audio devices such as headphones and speakers for better call quality.
CathsApp needs access to your camera to enable video calling with your contacts and to scan QR codes for quick connections.
CathsApp needs access to your contacts to help you find and connect with friends and family who are already using the app, making it easier to start conversations.
CathsApp uses your location to show you nearby events, connect you with local users, and provide location-based features to enhance your experience.
CathsApp uses your location while using the app to show you nearby events, connect you with local users, and provide location-based recommendations.
CathsApp needs access to your microphone to enable voice and video calls with your contacts.
CathsApp needs access to your photo library so you can share photos and videos in your conversations and set a profile picture.
